text: I bylo skazano: "O Nukh! S mirom ot Nas soydi (s kovchega), S blagosloveniyami nad toboy, Kak i nad nekim prochim lyudom, (Chto YA proizvedu) ot tekh, Chto nyne (na kovchege) prebyvayut. (Sred' nikh byt' i takim narodam), Kotorym My dostavim blaga, (Chto obol'styat ikh i povergnut v grekh), (Za chto) potom Postignet ikh ot Nas muchitel'naya kara
